sentences.cn: “ 灭火器弄的, 亲爱的, ”

sentences.en: A fire extinguisher is a fire - fighting implement.
Abstr: The text elaborated the basic step of the high civil building extinguisher distribution design, and illustrate with example.
sentences.cn: 文章摘要： 本文阐述了高层民用建筑灭火器配置设计的基本步骤，并举例说明。

sentences.en: Always have a fire extinguisher handy when working with a blowlamp.
sentences.cn: 工作中使用汽油吹焰管时,请将灭火器放在近旁.

sentences.en: Check the expiry date for all foam extinguisher.
sentences.cn: 检查所有泡沫灭火器的过期时间。

sentences.en: Fire extinguisher , please don't move it at will.
sentences.cn: 消防安全措施, 请勿随意搬动!

sentences.en: Having seen the manual, he pick the extinguisher.
sentences.cn: 看完了说明书，他拿起了灭火器。

sentences.en: He aimed a fire extinguisher at me.
He had the intelligence to put the fire out with a fire extinguisher.
sentences.cn: 他机灵地用灭火器灭火.

sentences.en: I directed the extinguisher at the fire without effect.
sentences.cn: 我把灭火器对准了火焰，但没起作用。

sentences.en: Jack was not exactly popular after the incident with the fire - extinguisher.
sentences.cn: 灭火器事件以后大家就一点也不喜欢杰克了.

sentences.en: Lee stood by with a fire extinguisher while the trash was burning.
sentences.cn: 当废物堆着火时,李拿了灭火器准备灭火.

sentences.en: Piping installation area should be fixed on fire extinguisher.
sentences.cn: 管道安装处要合理设置灭火器.

sentences.en: Please put fire extinguisher in position before refuelling.
The foam extinguisher is most effective to put out fire of oils.
sentences.cn: 泡沫灭火器扑救油类火灾最有效.

sentences.en: The newly developed extinguisher has been put into mass production.
sentences.cn: 新研制成的灭火剂已经大规模投入生产了.

sentences.en: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.cn: 他们向警察投掷了鸡蛋，木棍，酒瓶和一些灭火器。

sentences.en: We keep fire extinguisher downstairs in case of fire.
sentences.cn: 灭火器就在楼下,如果着火的话可以使用.

trans.tran_cn: 熄火者，消火者，消火器，熄火器
